::Firearm::

Firearm growls, knowing that shots were coming soon. He flies toward 
the Cybertronian Fire, trying once more to jerk Beastbox off of him. 
Se sees his severed foot laying on the ground, flying down toward it.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> The powerful arms of Firearm grab onto Beastbox, and try to yank 
him loose,
> but Beastbox had the smell of fresh fuel in his sensory system, and 
he held
> on tightly. " Blast him," He yelled to Squakwtalk, this Maximal was 
going
> down.
